description: Singleton: Personal profile information displayed on the homepage. Contains bio, image, and professional details.

fields.name: Internal Name

validations.message: Only one profile entry should exist

fields.helpText: Identifier for this profile (e.g., 'Simon Salazar Profile'). Should only have one instance

fields.name: Full Name
fields.helpText: Your full name as displayed on the homepage (e.g., 'Dr. Simon Salazar')

fields.name: Professional Title
fields.helpText: Your professional title or headline (e.g., 'Researcher & Developer', 'PhD Candidate in Computer Science'). Localized per language

fields.name: Biography Summary

validations.message: Keep bio summary under 500 characters for homepage display

fields.helpText: Brief introduction about yourself for the homepage. Keep warm, friendly, and concise. Max 500 characters. Localized per language

fields.name: Profile Photo

validations.message: Profile photo should be at least 400x400px for quality display

fields.helpText: Your professional photo. Recommended: Square format (e.g., 500x500px), friendly and approachable

fields.name: Contact Email
fields.helpText: Your contact email address. Optional, only if you want to display it publicly

fields.name: Social Media Links
fields.helpText: Your social media profiles (LinkedIn, GitHub, Twitter, etc.). Max 8 links. Use Social Link component

fields.name: Call-to-Action Button Text
fields.helpText: Optional button text on your profile section (e.g., 'View My Work', 'Download CV', 'Get in Touch'). Localized

fields.name: Call-to-Action Button URL

regexp.message: Enter a valid URL or relative path

fields.helpText: Destination for the CTA button. Can be relative path (e.g., '/cv.pdf') or full URL

fields.name: Resume/CV File
fields.helpText: Optional: Upload your CV/Resume as a downloadable file. PDF format recommended
